name: Dinner Dive
description:
You play as a cormorant diving to catch fish.

This game uses a single button for controls. Press any key or hold the mouse button down to swim forward in whatever direction the indicator is facing.

Catch one fish at a time and bring them to the surface. To beat the game, bring one of each type of fish to the surface.

You have a limited amount of air when diving, resurface or swim into the air pockets deeper under the water to fill your oxygen meter again.

Solo entry for Fishing Jam 2, responsible for all aspects. You can see the mini devlog thing here.

---

Heads up, this still has some bugs with collisions sorry. I'll get around to fixing them, visibility of the air pockets, and so on when I can!
